meanings.definition: A junior officer in the navy or coast guard.
meanings.sent1: The sublieutenants oversaw the training of new recruits.
meanings.sent2: The sublieutenants were responsible for maintaining order on the ship.
meanings.sent3: The sublieutenants tried to teach the parrot to salute, but it kept squawking instead.
meanings.sent4: The sublieutenants were the anchors that kept the crew steady during rough seas.
meanings.sent5: The bright uniforms of the sublieutenants stood out against the navy blue of the ship.

meanings.definition: A person holding a rank below lieutenant.
meanings.sent1: The sublieutenants were eager to prove themselves and advance in rank.
meanings.sent2: The sublieutenants worked hard to support their commanding officers.
meanings.sent3: The sublieutenants joked that they were like the sidekicks in a superhero team.
meanings.sent4: The sublieutenants were the foundation upon which the lieutenant built their strategies.
meanings.sent5: The sublieutenants were the unsung heroes of the naval fleet.
